comment.body: Hello @kaffie and everyone, to keep the videos seeding the best is to use webtorrent-desktop and to start it when you open your computer. I am currently working on adding a node service so you can also choose to have someone seeding it for you (or run it on a raspberry pie). But yeah sorry I am trying my best to make it works. Please if you have any issue post it on the github so I can try to fix it and if you want to contribute I can help you starting with it.
Yes it is but I think we all have been there ;) Great job on Zeronet Dev Center by the way.
Do you use merge site to do it ?
@Krixano: I just realized it was for zeronet only so it might not be needed in this case. I though it was something like wikipedia.
I think it is good practice so the user doesn't have to download everything at once.
@Sksn: So many things to develop ðŸ˜†.
@Krixano: Ah ah. I am not sure what to write.
